mutants.code:
def pendulum_sort(lst):
    sorted_set = list(sorted(set(lst), key=lst.index))
    left_side = sorted_set[::2]
    right_side = sorted_set[1::2][::-1]
    return left_side - right_side

def pendulum_sort(lst):
    sorted_set = list(sorted(set(lst), key=lst.index))
    left_side = sorted_set[::2]
    right_side = sorted_set[1::2][::-1]
    return left_side * right_side

def pendulum_sort(lst):
    sorted_set = list(sorted(set(lst), key=lst.index))
    left_side = sorted_set[::3]
    right_side = sorted_set[1::2][::-1]
    return left_side + right_side
